lead_paragraph: In a sign of his importance to the team, Wellington Hurricanes captain Dane Coles will be given until the last possible moment to decide if he is fit to start the Super Rugby semi-final against the Waikato Chiefs on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Hurricanes Wait on Coles Before Chiefs Semi-Final
headline.main: Hurricanes Wait on Coles Before Chiefs Semi-Final

snippet: In a sign of his importance to the team, Wellington Hurricanes captain Dane Coles will be given until the last possible moment to decide if he is fit to start the Super Rugby semi-final against the Waikato Chiefs on Saturday....
